00019 static const unsigned int kDEFAULT_LOG_BUFFLEN = 6;
00020 static const ReportCriteria kDEFAULT_REPORT_CRITERIA = AGGRESSIVE;
00021 static const tick_t kRESET_SUMS_AFTER = 100*1000;
00022 
00023 
00029 class WindowSpotter: public PatternSpotter {
00030 private:
00031         WindowSpotter& operator=(const WindowSpotter& other); // no copying
00032 
00033         static circBuffer *sBuff;
00034         static tick_t sBufferUpdatedTime;
00035 
00036         inline void ensureBufferLongEnough(idx_t len);
00037         inline void resetBufferIfNeeeded(tick_t currentTime);
00038         inline void updateBuffer(tick_t time, data_t x);
00039 
00040         data_t mCurrentDist;
00041         tick_t mEpochCounter;
00042         data_t mSumX;
00043         data_t mSumX2;
00044         data_t mMeanX;
00045         data_t mStdX;
00046 
00047 protected:
00048         idx_t mMaxWindowLen; // will be > M under uniform scaling
00049         idx_t mMinWindowLen; // will be < M under uniform scaling
00050 
00051         tick_t mLastMatchEndTime;
00052 
00053         // order for index comparisons for euclidean / LB_Keogh distances (we
00054         // want to compare more extreme indices first to accumulate distance
00055         // as fast as possible)
00056         idx_t *mOrder;
00057 
00058         // normalized and sorted version of the sequence we're searching for
00059         data_t *mSortedY;
00060 
00061         // callback for receiving new data; always called before computeDistance()
00062         virtual void onDataReceived(tick_t t, data_t x) {}
00063 
00064         // distance function
00065         virtual data_t computeDistance(const data_t* buffEnd,
00066                                                                    tick_t t, tick_t cantStartUntilAfter,
00067                                                                    data_t meanX, data_t stdX, data_t bsf)=0;
00068 
00071         virtual data_t normalize(data_t dist) const { return dist / M; };
00072 
00075         virtual data_t denormalize(data_t dist) const { return dist * M; };
00076 public:
00077 
00078         // -------------------------------
00079         // Overrides from PatternSpotter
00080         // -------------------------------
00081 
00082         // lifecycle
00083         explicit WindowSpotter(Template const& ref, SpotterParams const& p);
00084         explicit WindowSpotter(const WindowSpotter& other);
00085         virtual ~WindowSpotter();
00086 
00087         // getters
00088         virtual data_t getCurrentDist() const {
00089                 return mCurrentDist < INFINITY ? normalize(mCurrentDist) : INFINITY;
00090         }
00091         virtual tick_t getCurrentStartTime() const { return mTime - M + 1; }
00092 
00093         // setters
00094         virtual void setMaxWarp(steps_t maxWarp) { }
00095         virtual void setUseScalingEnvelopes(bool useEnvelopes) {}
00096 
00097         // other public functions
00098         virtual void updateMatrix(const tick_t t, const data_t* sample, data_t cutoff);
00099         virtual bool sequenceLocallyOptimal(Subsequence seq) const;
00100         void purgeAllOverlap(Subsequence seq);
00101         void purgeInferiorOverlap(Subsequence seq) {};
00102 };
